text: Eduardo Bauzá (16 November 1939 – 17 February 2019) was an Argentine politician. He was Minister of Health and Minister of the Interior under Carlos Menem presidency from 1989 to 1990, and was later the first Chief of the Cabinet of Ministers from 1995 to 1996.Falleció Eduardo Bauzá, ex ministro de Carlos Menem y el primer Jefe de Gabinete de la historia He was member of the Senate from 5 June 1996 until 10 December 1999.Murió el político argentino Eduardo Bauzá, referente histórico del peronismo In 2004, Bauzá was diagnosed with the Alzheimer's disease.Fue internado el ex senador Eduardo Bauzá He died on 17 February 2019 in Buenos Aires from complications of the disease, aged 79. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:Argentine politicians
title: Eduardo Bauzá
